trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked forever ask [Type in a number between 0 and 127 (60 is middle C) and I display the corresponding MIDI note name as well as playing the note:] and wait set [note v] to (answer) play note (note) for (0.5) beats say (item (((note) mod (12)) + (1)) of [notes v] :: list) for (3) secs end
